name: szikqr
description: QR code generator for my dorm. Our logo can be included. Available at [szikqr.pages.dev](https://szikqr.pages.dev)

scripts.build: rm -rf public && mkdir public && npm run build:copy && npm run build:css
scripts.start: npm run build; python3 -m http.server 3000 --directory public > /dev/null 2>&1 & echo "http://localhost:3000"; while read -r; do npm run build; done
